fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Budget, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Trans-European Networks, Transport
eu_initiatives: Taxation, excise tax, EMCS, FWD, FQD, RED, ETD, Common Nomenclature, Custom rules, Fiscalis, Fuels and lubricants quality
organisation_name: Polska Organizacja Przemysłu i Handlu Naftowego (POPiHN)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
POPiHN is associated with: 
- EUROPIA, the European Petroleum Industry Association 
- UEIL, Independent Union of the European Lubricants Industry
goals__remit: One of the most important objectives of POPiHN is to ensure balanced development of the competitive fuel market in Poland by inter alia acting towards introduction of business principles in keeping with the EU legislation and equal treatment of all Polish fuel market players. POPiHN has been focusing on coordinating cooperation between member companies to facilitate the highest product and service quality in order to create a positive public image of member companies by coordinating and supporting responsible business activities. POPiHN is also looking towards initiatives to reduce underground economy in the fuel market in Poland.
